name: No Time Clue
description: This game was made during a game where time is random, like it is out of control just like your character bladder. He drank too much water and now he needs to go to the washroom. So help him by using W,A,S,D or Arrow keys. Change weapon by alpha 1 and alpha 2 keys, shoot with mouse left button and aim with mouse( may be you already have gussed it)...
